title: Projects log
description: Each entry records the state of new, ongoing, or recently completed project.

start_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date when project started.

end_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date when project completed.

location_id.description: location where project was carried out.

person_id.description: the person who led the project.

is_successful.description: indicates whether the project was successful
